title: Better reading
brief_description: Illustrates examples of poor reading habits and shows how these may be overcome by adopting corrective reading methods. The film illustrates the case of an intelligent high school student whose work suffers from his slow reading habits. The student attends a mobile reading clinic where he undertakes a course in reading improvement designed to improve his vocabulary, increase his understanding, and speed up his reading techniques.
